body_content.explanation: a system for selling a product in which someone agrees to buy an amount of it at a wholesale price (= a lower price paid by a business), and then tries to make money by selling the product at a higher price to other people, or getting other people to sell it for them:
examples: They changed the marketing plan, got rid of all the sales people and moved into network marketing.
She is successfully self-employed in a network marketing business.
